mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VOTING(TITLE, NUM, AFFIL, NAME, SCORE, PERCENTAGE) VALUES (#{title}, #{num}, #{affil}, #{name}, #{score}, 0)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM VOTING WHERE NUM = #{num} AND TITLE = #{title}
mapper.select: SELECT TITLE, NUM, AFFIL, NAME, SCORE, PERCENTAGE FROM VOTING
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VOTED(TITLE, MEMBER_ID, NUM) VALUES (#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{num})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VOTED WHERE TITLE = #{title} AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.update: UPDATE VOTING v1 JOIN ( SELECT TITLE, SUM(SCORE) AS TOTAL_SCORE FROM VOTING GROUP BY TITLE ) v2 ON v1.TITLE = v2.TITLE SET v1.PERCENTAGE = v1.SCORE / v2.TOTAL_SCORE * 100 WHERE v1.TITLE = #{title};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VOTEDATA(TITLE, MEMBER_ID, NUM, GENDER, AGE, REGION) VALUES (#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{num}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{region})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VOTEDATA WHERE GENDER = #{gender}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VOTEDATA WHERE REGION = #{region}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VOTEDATA WHERE AGE = #{age}
